thread.title: Newport Beach’s Most Trusted Luxury Estate Broker First Team Estates Christie’s International Lists Landmark Big Canyon Estate For $9.888 Million
thread.title_full: Newport Beach’s Most Trusted Luxury Estate Broker First Team Estates Christie’s International Lists Landmark Big Canyon Estate For $9.888 Million

author: JEFF GIBSON
title: Newport Beach’s Most Trusted Luxury Estate Broker First Team Estates Christie’s International Lists Landmark Big Canyon Estate For $9.888 Million
text:
One of the stand out properties in Orange County’s growing exclusive estate luxury market has been brought to market by First Team Estates Christie’s International’s own agent Jason C. Bradshaw. The home at 22 Cypress Point Lane in guard gated, ultra-private Big Canyon Country Club in Newport Beach, CA is situated on the 18th tee of the landmark golf course that has hosted Hollywood stars and business titans for generations. Completely decorated in a classic European palazzo style with five bedrooms and five-and-a-half bathrooms, each room compliments the other in an incredibly powerful statement of luxury.
“ First Team Estates Christie’s International has been serving and helping build the Newport Beach exclusive luxury market for forty years,” said Mark Hughes, Chief Operating Officer for First Team Estates Christie’s International . “Jason C. Bradshaw has established a record of success that is rarely equaled because he is able to look at entirely unique estates like 22 Cypress Point and find the long and short term values that make this a great opportunity.”
Steps from the clubhouse at Big Canyon and less than a mile from the world renowned Fashion Island and Newport Center financial community, the home at 22 Cypress Point has approximately 7,000 square feet of living space that includes four bedrooms and six baths. Each bedroom retreat is decorated in the finest master crafted marble, stone, wood, and painted murals. The grounds of this oversized 14,500 square foot corner lot are punctuated with lush classically formal gardens that offer incredible opportunities for entertaining, especially when combined with the subterranean custom wine cellar and tasting lounge, and full catering kitchen. For more information on the home go to http://www.22CypressPoint.com .
“Estates like 22 Cypress Point rarely come onto the market, maybe once in a decade,” explained First Team Estates Christie’s International agent Jason C. Bradshaw. “It has been incredibly interesting getting to know the rich history of this property built over the course of about twenty years, the care in which it was put together, and understand all of the assets the property has that easily value it amongst the most exclusive properties in Southern California.”
ABOUT FIRST TEAM ESTATES CHRISTIE’S INTERNATIONAL
First Team Estates Christie's International specializes in selling Orange County's most unique and exclusive properties. As part of the luxury division of Southern California's most trusted real estate company, First Team Real Estate, First Team Estates Christie's International has been recognized for its unparalleled level of service for estate buyers and international buyers in major media in Asia and the United States. In 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014 and now 2015, First Team Estates Christie's International was recognized as ‘Best of OC’ for Real Estate Companies by the annual Orange County Register survey of 100,000 Southern California households. We can be reached at (888) 236-1943 or at firstteam.com .
